locations.name: San Francisco
locations.description: Iconic city known for the Golden Gate Bridge, cable cars, Alcatraz, and diverse neighbourhoods. The tour starts here.

locations.name: Napa Valley
locations.description: World-renowned wine region famous for its vineyards, wineries, gourmet food, and scenic rolling hills. (Coordinates are approximate for the valley center).

locations.name: Monterey / Carmel-by-the-Sea area
locations.description: Likely overnight stop along the Highway 1 drive through Big Sur, known for stunning coastal scenery, the Monterey Bay Aquarium, and charming towns. (Coordinates for general area midpoint).

locations.name: Santa Barbara
locations.description: Known as the 'American Riviera', offering beautiful beaches, Spanish Colonial Revival architecture, upscale boutiques, and a relaxed coastal atmosphere. The tour ends here.
